revision.text:
__NOTOC__ fixed '''GetSideUDMFFixed''' (int ''lineid'', bool ''side'', string ''key'')
== Usage ==
Retrieves a value for a custom user key set for a line.
=== Parameters === *''lineid'' :The [[tag]] of the sidedef's line. *''side'' :If 0, the front side of the line; if 1, the back side. The {{c|SIDE_FRONT}} and {{c|SIDE_BACK}} constants can also be used. *''key'' :The name given to the user key.
=== Return value === The [[fixed point]] value that was set for this user key.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[category:ACS Information functions]]
